root.heading: Financial Arrangements
root.text:
Whether you have been saving for a while, plan on using a low interest credit card or just need some direction in choosing the finance company that will fit your situation, we are here to help.

We accept:

  • Cash, Check, or Debit (5% discount on services if used)
  • Credit Card (VISA, Master Card, and DISCOVER)
If any of the above forms of payment are not options for you at this time, we also offer financing through 3rd party financial providers.
